idea:
KUBER BHOOMI POWER PRIVATE LIMITED is a corporate entity which deals production of energy without effecting environment. Company will execute project for generation of electricity that will bring a revolutionary change in the field of green and renewable energy.

 

Energy conservation is one of the most important and essential aspects in today's world. It has become necessary to develop new techniques for production of electricity that proves to be an environment friendly.

 

Our team has developed a technology that will help in generating 24 hours continuous in a day electricity without harming the environment and exploitation of natural resources. This method would be totally different from Solar Energy, wind energy, hydro energy and other sources of energy.

 

There are no such mechanisms in the world for generation of clean and green energy that our team has developed.
name: KUBER BHOOMI POWER PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Our entire world is moving ahead with a great pace to catch and encash the benefits of the Modern Medical Science and Modern Technology in Cosmetic Industry. Looks has been a big concern, and to maintain it people have given up their money and time but the results are not the way they desire. Despite of Modern Cosmetology techniques, the percentage of skin diseases, rash, acne, dark circles, hairfall, dandruff etc have been increasing day by day and the industry needs perfect solution for this, which will mitigates their complaints and enhance the pure beauty within. Ammaltas Aayurveda is an attempt to give the society the benefit by giving an authentic product which not only solve their problems but also give them confidence to achieve the looks they desire. We manufacturing, buying, selling, reselling, importing, exporting, transporting, storing, developing, promoting, supplying, distributing, trading and dealing in cosmetics products, daily use products, non-medicated cosmetics, and toiletry products, soap, shampoo, perfumery, essential oils; bleaching and other substances for laundry use; cleaning and polishing products, beauty care products, ayurvedic products, and other medicated and non-medicated products on retail as well as on wholesale basis and to provide related services in India or anywhere in the world.
name: AMMALTAS AAYURVEDIC PRIVATE LIMITED
